betterquesting:10.desc:8:
[quest]Laser Meteor Miner[/quest]

§6Machine Type: §aMeteor Miner§r

There are §c2§r tiers of the Laser Meteor Miner. 

For the Laser Meteor Miner to work, the center of the meteor has to be §c48§r blocks above the highest block of the multi itself. 

The laser will mine in a radius of up to §c40§r blocks in each direction from the center of the meteor. 

All the chunks involved §lmust§r be §9chunkloaded§r.

The laser will automatically set its radius based on the meteor spawned. If it does not find anything, it will wait for a meteor to spawn. 

[note]The Meteor Miner Schematic needs to be in the controller to run[/note]

§4Tier I:§r Mines §c1§r §oblock§r every cycle.
 
Default Fortune is §c0§r but can be increased by putting in special pickaxes: 

§6Fortune I: §9Pickaxe of the Core
§6Fortune II: §9Bound Pickaxe
§6Fortune III: §9Terra Shatterer
